name: jAuthentic
short_description: Authentication of a user is a common requirement in many applications - right from unlocking your phone to using many internet services. Developers need to concentrate on the process of authentication much like they do for the business that they are developing. This framework aims to separate the authentication logic from the core business logic. This framework is scalable and configurable to a very great extent.
summary: Helps in separation of Authentication logic from actual workflow.
